thread.title: Square Enix Reveals New Kingdom Hearts Aqua Figure
thread.title_full: Square Enix Reveals New Kingdom Hearts Aqua Figure

author: Jordan Leendertsen
title: Square Enix Reveals New Kingdom Hearts Aqua Figure
text:
Square Enix Reveals New Kingdom Hearts Aqua Figure gamer culture by Jordan Leendertsen   12:20 PM 2,912 Views 
Today, Square Enix revealed that Kingdom Hearts' Aqua will be the latest character to join its Play Arts Kai figure line. The announcement shows series mainstay Aqua in her Kingdom Hearts 0.2 A Fragmentary Passage attire, with a Keyblade accesory. Look who is joining our #PlayArtsKAI line! #KINGDOMHEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep A Fragment Passage - AQUA ! pic.twitter.com/A9lg7W4QIC â€” SQEX Products EMEA (@SQEX_Merch_EMEA) February 1, 2017 
The figure doesn't have any release date yet, and is not available for pre-order on Square's website. You can read what Game Informer's Kimberley Wallace thought of the recently released Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chaper Prologue, which contains the latest chapter of Aqua's adventure, here . 
[Source: Square Enix Products Twitter ] 
Email the author , or follow on Game Informer .
